::Zardus::

Zardus stops at a door and taps a button near it. The door slides 
aside, a large lab full of machines beyond it.

"This will be your lab," he says, motioning for her to enter. "The 
samples will be along shortly. If you need anything, contact me using 
the comm."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk follows trying to hold back a smile, she knew that 
dignified
> royalty never showed pleasure or displeasure but she couldn't help 
herself.
> She had achieved what she'd set out to do, her father would be 
pleased.
